articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Will Rohit Sharma-led India pull out of Champions Trophy in Pakistan? BCCI vice-president Rajeev Shukla quashes rumours - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The Indian cricket team has not travelled to Pakistan since the 2008 Asia Cup, owing to rising political tension between the two neighbouring countries | Crickit
articles.content: The first major assignment for Gautam Gambhir, the newly-named head coach of the Indian men's cricket team, will be the ICC Champions Trophy, slated to begin in February 2025 in Pakistan. It will als… [+2241 chars]
